Description: Talking on the mobile phone while sitting on the bed and walking.

Walking; removing dust from the bed using a pillow; and sleeping on the bed.
Yoga: Standing forward bend (Uttanasana).

Picking up the mobile phone from the ground; placing it on the bed; and sitting on the bed.
Exercising (Moving both hands up and down).

Standing up from a sitting position on the bed and then sitting on the ground.
Standing up from the ground and closing the curtain.
Removing the shirt and hanging it on the hanger.
Going to bed and sleeping (belly facing downwards).
Sitting on the ground and reading a book.
Walking and reading something while sitting on the bed.
Reading a newspaper while sitting on the bed and placing a pillow on the lap.
Reading a newspaper
Standing up from bed; walking; and checking the dress on the hanger.
Walking; opening the window; and looking outside.
Sitting on the ground and writing in a notebook.

Picking up a pen from the ground and walking.
Exercising (Push-up) and sitting.
